question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password: 1) Go to the login page, 2) Click 'Forgot Password', 3) Enter your email address, 4) Check your email for a reset link, 5) Follow the link and create a new password. The link expires in 24 hours.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer support is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. For urgent issues outside business hours, please email support@example.com and we'll respond within 24 hours.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: To track your order: 1) Log into your account, 2) Go to 'My Orders', 3) Click on the order number you want to track, 4) View real-time tracking information. You'll also receive tracking updates via email.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: To cancel your subscription: 1) Log into your account, 2) Go to 'Billing & Subscriptions', 3) Click 'Cancel Subscription', 4) Confirm cancellation. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes! We offer 20% off for students. Verify your student status through our partner platform (link sent after signup). The discount applies to monthly and annual plans.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: To update your payment method: 1) Go to Account Settings, 2) Click 'Payment Methods', 3) Add a new card or update existing one, 4) Save changes. Your next bill will use the updated payment method.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we take security seriously. We use bank-level 256-bit SSL encryption, comply with GDPR and CCPA, and never share your data with third parties. All data is stored on secure servers with regular backups.

question: Can I upgrade my plan?
answer: Absolutely! Go to Account Settings > Plan & Billing > Upgrade Plan. You'll be charged the prorated difference immediately, and your new features activate instantly.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: To delete your account: 1) Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account, 2) Confirm deletion, 3) Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. Note: This action cannot be undone.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can reach us via: 1) Live chat (this chatbot), 2) Email: support@example.com, 3) Phone: 1-800-SUPPORT (business hours only). Average response time is under 2 hours.

question: Do you have a mobile app?
answer: Yes! Our mobile app is available on iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). Download it and log in with your existing credentials. All features are available on mobile.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: To change your email: 1) Go to Account Settings, 2) Click 'Email', 3) Enter new email, 4) Verify via confirmation link sent to new email. This ensures account security.

question: What happens if I miss a payment?
answer: If a payment fails, we'll retry 3 times over 7 days and send email reminders. If all retries fail, your account is suspended until payment is updated. No data is deleted during suspension.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes! Go to Settings > Privacy > Export Data. We'll email you a downloadable ZIP file containing all your data within 48 hours. This includes profile info, messages, and transaction history in JSON format.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
answer: To enable 2FA: 1) Go to Security Settings, 2) Click 'Enable Two-Factor Auth', 3) Scan QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy), 4) Enter verification code. Save backup codes in a secure location.

question: What's the difference between plans?
answer: Basic ($9/mo): 5 projects, 1GB storage. Pro ($29/mo): Unlimited projects, 50GB storage, priority support. Enterprise (custom): Unlimited everything, dedicated support, SLA guarantee. All plans include core features.

question: How do I invite team members?
answer: To invite team members: 1) Go to Team Settings, 2) Click 'Invite Member', 3) Enter their email, 4) Set role (Admin/Member/Viewer), 5) Send invite. They'll receive an email to join. Pro plan required for teams.

question: Can I pause my subscription?
answer: Yes! You can pause for up to 3 months. Go to Billing > Pause Subscription. Your data is preserved, but access is disabled during pause. Resume anytime without losing settings or data.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Report bugs via: 1) In-app bug reporter (Help > Report Bug), 2) Email bugs@example.com with screenshots, 3) GitHub issues for open-source components. Include steps to reproduce and your browser/device info.

question: Do you offer API access?
answer: Yes! API access is available on Pro and Enterprise plans. Get your API key from Developer Settings. Documentation at docs.example.com/api. Rate limits: 1000 requests/hour (Pro), unlimited (Enterprise).

question: How do I integrate with Slack?
answer: To integrate Slack: 1) Go to Integrations > Slack, 2) Click 'Connect', 3) Authorize in Slack workspace, 4) Choose channels for notifications. You'll get real-time alerts for important events.

question: What browsers do you support?
answer: We support the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For best experience, keep your browser updated. Internet Explorer is not supported. Mobile browsers work on iOS 13+ and Android 8+.

question: How do I get an invoice?
answer: Invoices are auto-emailed after each payment. To download past invoices: 1) Go to Billing > Invoice History, 2) Click invoice to download PDF. Invoices include tax info and payment details.

question: Can I customize my subdomain?
answer: Yes, on Pro+ plans! Go to Settings > Custom Domain. Choose your subdomain (yourname.example.com) or use your own domain with CNAME setup. Changes take up to 24 hours to propagate.

question: How do I restore deleted items?
answer: Deleted items go to Trash for 30 days. Go to Trash, select items, click 'Restore'. After 30 days, items are permanently deleted. Pro users get 90-day retention. Enterprise can request custom retention.

question: What's your uptime guarantee?
answer: We guarantee 99.9% uptime on Pro and Enterprise plans (monitored at status.example.com). Scheduled maintenance is announced 48 hours in advance. Enterprise SLA includes compensation for downtime exceeding guarantee.

question: How do I change my username?
answer: To change username: 1) Go to Profile Settings, 2) Click 'Edit Username', 3) Enter new username (alphanumeric, 3-20 chars), 4) Confirm. Username changes are limited to once per 30 days.

question: Do you offer enterprise SSO?
answer: Yes! Enterprise plans support SAML 2.0 SSO with providers like Okta, Azure AD, and OneLogin. Contact sales for setup. SSO includes centralized user management, MFA enforcement, and audit logs.

question: How do I import data from competitors?
answer: We support imports from major competitors. Go to Settings > Import Data, select source platform, upload export file (CSV/JSON). Our migration team can assist Enterprise customers with large imports.

question: Can I schedule automated reports?
answer: Yes, on Pro+ plans. Go to Reports > Schedule, choose frequency (daily/weekly/monthly), select metrics, add recipients. Reports are emailed as PDF or Excel. Custom reports available for Enterprise.

question: What's your data retention policy?
answer: Active accounts: Data retained indefinitely. Cancelled accounts: Data kept for 90 days then deleted. Enterprise can request custom retention (1-7 years). Backups retained for 30 days for disaster recovery.

question: How do I enable dark mode?
answer: Click your profile icon > Settings > Appearance > Dark Mode. Options: Light, Dark, or Auto (follows system). Dark mode reduces eye strain and saves battery on OLED screens.

question: Can I use this offline?
answer: Limited offline support via our mobile apps. View cached data and make changes; they'll sync when reconnected. Real-time features require internet. Progressive Web App (PWA) coming soon for better offline.

question: How do I bulk upload files?
answer: Drag and drop up to 100 files at once, or use Upload > Bulk Upload. Supported formats: PDF, DOC, XLS, PNG, JPG. Max 50MB per file. Pro users get 500MB, Enterprise unlimited.

question: What languages do you support?
answer: Currently available in English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and Portuguese. Change language in Settings > Language. More languages coming Q2 2026. API responses always in JSON.

question: How do I set up webhooks?
answer: Pro+ feature. Go to Developer Settings > Webhooks > Add Endpoint. Enter URL, select events (user.created, order.completed, etc.), save. Test with sample payload. Includes retry logic and delivery logs.

question: Can I white-label the platform?
answer: Enterprise only. Remove our branding, add your logo/colors, custom domain, custom email templates. White-label addon is $500/month. Includes dedicated onboarding and design consultation.

question: How do I get priority support?
answer: Included with Pro ($29/mo) and Enterprise plans. Benefits: <2 hour response time, dedicated Slack channel, video call support, phone support. Basic plan has 24-hour email response.

question: What's your compliance certification?
answer: We're SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR and CCPA compliant, HIPAA available for Enterprise. Annual audits by third parties. Compliance docs available in Trust Center at trust.example.com.

question: How do I collaborate in real-time?
answer: Open any document, share link with team. Changes sync instantly with presence indicators showing who's online. Comments and mentions notify collaborators. Works like Google Docs.

question: Can I automate workflows?
answer: Yes! Use our automation builder: Settings > Automations > Create. Triggers (form submit, status change) + Actions (send email, create task). Zapier integration available for 3000+ apps.

question: How do I request a feature?
answer: Submit ideas at feedback.example.com or in-app via Help > Feature Request. Upvote existing requests. We review monthly and prioritize based on votes. Roadmap publicly visible.

question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
answer: You have 90 days to export your data after cancellation. After 90 days, all data is permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Export early to avoid data loss!

question: How do I enable email notifications?
answer: Go to Settings > Notifications. Choose what to receive: mentions, updates, digests. Set frequency (instant, hourly, daily). Unsubscribe links in every email. Mobile push available via app.

question: Can I transfer ownership of my account?
answer: Yes. Go to Account Settings > Transfer Ownership, enter new owner's email, confirm. They must accept within 7 days. Transfers billing responsibility and admin access. Irreversible once accepted.

question: How do I use keyboard shortcuts?
answer: Press '?' to see all shortcuts. Common ones: Ctrl+K (search), Ctrl+N (new), Ctrl+S (save), Ctrl+/ (help). Customize in Settings > Keyboard. Shortcuts work across web and desktop apps.

question: What's your fair use policy?
answer: Unlimited plans have fair use limits: 10TB bandwidth, 1M API calls/month, 100 concurrent users. Excessive use may prompt upgrade suggestion. Enterprise has no caps. Contact sales for clarification.

question: How do I get a demo for my team?
answer: Book a personalized demo at example.com/demo or email sales@example.com. 30-minute session covers your use case, Q&A, and trial setup. Enterprise demos include custom solution architecture.
